properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " /priv" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -priv") and (FolderPath endswith "\\whoami.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "whoami.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a whoami.exe executed with the /priv command line flag instructing the tool to show all current user privileges. This is often used after a privilege escalation attem
